response.message: When's the podcast due to come back?
Resurgent unicorns can only be a good thing.
“Sidekick to the CEO” — so either Robin, or Alfred. Maybe Alfred?
Just finished the last episode of the Stackoverflow Podcast and now it will be resurged? WOOT!
Podcast coming back! Sweet! Can't wait. WOOT!
DevDays?  Great!  Especially if it means another Miguel deIcaza speaking gig.

Welcome Alex!

I for one think you should don the "Alfred" role for a day and get your self a long tail suit and get a picture next to Joel.

Hazzah for the podcast return!
Hey - can we have Martin Sheen as the first guest of SOP (Stackoverflow Podcast) 2.0?

Looking forward to the podcast.  It's original inclusion in my itconversations stream is why I found this place in the beginning.

Would love to hear more about how the company has evolved as a business.
